```javascript
import Redis from 'ioredis';

const redis = new Redis();

const initialData = {
	1702459181837:
		'{"title":"sunt aut","content":"quia et suscipit suscipit recusandae","updateTime":"2023-12-13T09:19:48.837Z"}',
	1702459182837:
		'{"title":"qui est","content":"est rerum tempore vitae sequi sint","updateTime":"2023-12-13T09:19:48.837Z"}',
	1702459188837:
		'{"title":"ea molestias","content":"et iusto sed quo iure","updateTime":"2023-12-13T09:19:48.837Z"}'
};

export async function getAllNotes() {
	const data = await redis.hgetall('notes');
	if (Object.keys(data).length == 0) {
		await redis.hset('notes', initialData);
	}
	return await redis.hgetall('notes');
}

export async function addNote(data) {
	const uuid = Date.now().toString();
	await redis.hset('notes', [uuid], data);
	return uuid;
}

export async function updateNote(uuid, data) {
	await redis.hset('notes', [uuid], data);
}

export async function getNote(uuid) {
	console.log(`get note ${uuid}`);
	return JSON.parse(await redis.hget('notes', uuid));
}

export async function delNote(uuid) {
	return redis.hdel('notes', uuid);
}

export async function addUser(username, password) {
	await redis.hset('users', [username], password);
	return {
		name: username,
		username
	};
}

export async function getUser(username, password) {
	const passwordFromDB = await redis.hget('users', username);
	if (!passwordFromDB) return 0;
	if (passwordFromDB !== password) return 1;
	return {
		name: username,
		username
	};
}

export default redis;
```

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-javascript",children:`import Redis from 'ioredis';\r
\r
const redis = new Redis();\r
\r
const initialData = {\r
	1702459181837:\r
		'{"title":"sunt aut","content":"quia et suscipit suscipit recusandae","updateTime":"2023-12-13T09:19:48.837Z"}',\r
	1702459182837:\r
		'{"title":"qui est","content":"est rerum tempore vitae sequi sint","updateTime":"2023-12-13T09:19:48.837Z"}',\r
	1702459188837:\r
		'{"title":"ea molestias","content":"et iusto sed quo iure","updateTime":"2023-12-13T09:19:48.837Z"}'\r
};\r
\r
export async function getAllNotes() {\r
	const data = await redis.hgetall('notes');\r
	if (Object.keys(data).length == 0) {\r
		await redis.hset('notes', initialData);\r
	}\r
	return await redis.hgetall('notes');\r
}\r
\r
export async function addNote(data) {\r
	const uuid = Date.now().toString();\r
	await redis.hset('notes', [uuid], data);\r
	return uuid;\r
}\r
\r
export async function updateNote(uuid, data) {\r
	await redis.hset('notes', [uuid], data);\r
}\r
\r
export async function getNote(uuid) {\r
	console.log(\`get note \${uuid}\`);\r
	return JSON.parse(await redis.hget('notes', uuid));\r
}\r
\r
export async function delNote(uuid) {\r
	return redis.hdel('notes', uuid);\r
}\r
\r
export async function addUser(username, password) {\r
	await redis.hset('users', [username], password);\r
	return {\r
		name: username,\r
		username\r
	};\r
}\r
\r
export async function getUser(username, password) {\r
	const passwordFromDB = await redis.hget('users', username);\r
	if (!passwordFromDB) return 0;\r
	if (passwordFromDB !== password) return 1;\r
	return {\r
		name: username,\r
		username\r
	};\r
}\r
\r
export default redis;
